revised_title: Evolution of the Vertebral Column in Birds: A Study in Larus and Struthio
tldr: This study investigates the development of the vertebral column in birds, specifically in Larus (seagull) and Struthio (ostrich) embryos. The research focuses on understanding the evolution of the vertebral column and the differentiation of somites into dermato-myotomes and sclerotomes. The findings contribute to the understanding of the development of the membranous and cartilaginous components of vertebrae in birds.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Vertebrate Development
